channel.title: Savechar/loadchar System NEEDED!
channel.description:
Can anyone help me on my savegame, basically ive deleted the orginall one and i need to make it so it saves right now it doesnt ive tried and tried but it just wont work, i need it so it only saves in character file if anyone can help me on this that would be great
=thanks uk 0wn4g3
[size=15pt]Basically im in need of a basic savechar/loadchar System.[/size]
Anyone please?
